title: Rajputana Peacock Haaram - A Timeless Legacy
materials: Hyderabadi Polish. Adorned with high-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones
and Emerald accents. Durable chain link design.
features: Inspired by Rajputana Royalty, this Haaram features a beautifully crafted pendant with intricate peacock motifs. Detailed filigree work (తీగ పని) with beaded gold dangles (గుట్టపూసలు). The pendant showcases a symmetrical design with peacocks facing each other, symbolizing love and harmony. High-quality cubic zirconia for a diamond-like sparkle.
colors: Predominantly gold with vibrant accents of ruby red and emerald green. Traditional South Indian color palette.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Can also be styled for festive occasions.
description: This Rajputana Peacock Haaram embodies the rich cultural heritage of South Indian jewelry design. The exquisite craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and value. The peacock motif is a symbol of beauty, royalty, and prosperity. Makes a stunning heirloom piece for generations to come. The detailed filigree work, the Hyderabadi polish, and the high-quality Cubic Zirconia stones elevate this piece to a luxury status.
